comment: These people are supposed 'refugees' trying to escape all of the oppression in their own country. Why then are they carrying the Honduran flag as they march on America? Only invaders do that. Militarize the border Mr. President, the Mexican federales say they are arriving to facilitate their invasion into America and deploying our military to protect our borders and the American people is long overdue.

comment: If they loved their country they would stay and fix it. But it is about "free stuff", we all know that. Same for the masses swarming Europe the past few years. Like moths to a flame, if you dangle free stuff in their face the deadbeats will come. Cut all social services to all but citizens and watch them turn around.
